price: Musa berkata, "Tuhan kami ialah (Tuhan) yang telah memberikan kepada tiap-tiap sesuatu bentuk kejadiannya, kemudian memberinya petunjuk 925."
arabic: قَالَ رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَعۡطَىٰ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلۡقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ
footnotes: 925.  Maksudnya ialah memberikan akal, insting (naluri), dan kodrat alamiyah untuk kelanjutan hidupnya masing-masing.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbunā alladhī aʿṭā kulla shayin khalqahu thumma hadā
